thread.title: Robert & Beth Bailey
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Robert & Beth Bailey

author: Robert & Beth Bailey
title: Robert & Beth Bailey
text: We were not sure what company to choose to help us through our tax situation. We were VERY happy we went with Optima Tax Relief. They were very professional, accountable, and worked very hard with us to get our tax situation settled. It was a little costly, but worth every penny in the long run! Thank you Optima!!
